attributes.action: remove pedal bicycle access to London bus lanes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Buses are being held up by slow-moving bicycles blocking bus lanes.  They can substantially reduce the speed that buses travel at - this being especially true in rush hour periods.

If a bus is using a lane and cannot pass a cyclist in front, the bus has no option but to slow to 10 or 15mph until the cyclist exits the bus lane.  This can take a considerable time.  

This proposal particularly makes sense considering that there are far more people on a fast-moving bus than one slow-moving individual on a bicycle delaying them.
